## News Review for automationedge

# AutomationEdge News Review

## Executive Summary

AutomationEdge has gained market recognition as a key player in the hyper-automation sector, being listed alongside established vendors including UiPath, IBM, and ABBYY in SNS Insider's analysis of a market projected to reach $179.96 billion by 2032 with a 16.89% compound annual growth rate ([source](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2025/12/17/3206924/0/en/Hyper-Automation-Market-Set-for-Strong-Expansion-to-USD-179-96-Billion-by-2032-Driven-by-Rising-Demand-for-Operational-Efficiency-and-Cost-Reduction-SNS-Insider.html)). The company's dual product portfolio of AutomationEdge IT Automation and AutomationEdge RPA positions it within a rapidly expanding market driven by enterprise demand for operational efficiency and cost reduction across IT, telecommunications, and finance sectors.

## Key Developments

**Market Recognition**: AutomationEdge received analyst recognition from SNS Insider as a notable player in the hyper-automation market, appearing in a comprehensive industry analysis that identified key vendors in a sector growing from $44.38 billion in 2023 to a projected $179.96 billion by 2032 ([source](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2025/12/17/3206924/0/en/Hyper-Automation-Market-Set-for-Strong-Expansion-to-USD-179-96-Billion-by-2032-Driven-by-Rising-Demand-for-Operational-Efficiency-and-Cost-Reduction-SNS-Insider.html)).

**Product Portfolio**: The company's offerings include both AutomationEdge IT Automation and AutomationEdge RPA solutions, distinguishing it from vendors with single-focus automation capabilities.

## Market Context

The hyper-automation market is experiencing expansion driven by artificial intelligence, machine learning, and robotic process automation adoption across multiple industry verticals. AutomationEdge operates within this growth environment alongside competitors including UiPath, IBM, Automation Anywhere, and ABBYY. The market's 16.89% compound annual growth rate through 2032 indicates substantial opportunity for automation vendors as enterprises prioritize operational efficiency and cost reduction initiatives across IT, telecommunications, and financial services sectors.

## Strategic Implications

AutomationEdge's inclusion in industry analyst recognition provides market credibility and positions the company within a high-growth sector experiencing strong enterprise demand. The company's dual focus on IT automation and RPA capabilities offers differentiation in a market where many vendors concentrate on single automation disciplines. This positioning within a rapidly expanding market segment creates opportunities for business development as organizations seek comprehensive automation solutions that address multiple operational requirements.

## Summary

AutomationEdge has been recognized as a key player in the hyper-automation market by SNS Insider, appearing alongside major vendors like UiPath, IBM, and ABBYY in a market projected to reach $179.96 billion by 2032 with a 16.89% CAGR. The company offers both AutomationEdge IT Automation and AutomationEdge RPA solutions, positioning itself in a rapidly expanding market driven by enterprise demand for operational efficiency and cost reduction across IT, telecommunications, and finance sectors.
